title: LAP TIME detail page Â» SESSION RESULT
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to see the SESSION RESULT in which the LAP TIME was achieved\
So I can find out other lap times for comparison
description:
* The LAP TIME detail page is extended to contain a section for the connected SESSION RESULT.
* The SESSION RESULT is presented with its name and primary information.
* The SESSION RESULT contains a link to its detail page.
* The SESSION RESULT has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no SESSION RESULT connected to the LAP TIME then the section is not displayed at all.
